summary: In Ethiopia; there is a slow boiling of a feud between a wealthy Lord and a protester who feels he is mistreating his laborers. While the viewer gets to closely examine the culture, conversations, and lives of the locals who surround them.
cast: Kasu Asfaw|Gebru Kasa|Worke Kasa|Melaku Makonen|Adane Melaku|Harege-Weyn Tafere
title: Mirt Sost Shi Amit
